tvdb: Jack gets Livvie to see she loves him and not Caleb.  After making love, Jack vows to fight Caleb if he returns.  Ian learns Michael's not a real priest.  After James dies, Lucy, Kevin and Rafe search for Caleb's talisman.  They find a book on the Morley family and realize Caleb and Michael are the same person.  Eve tells Michael she loves him, but not in a romantic way.  Fearing for her safety, he makes her leave.  Caleb appears and taunts Michael and they go for each other's throats.  Eve returns but finds only Michael, who warns her Caleb's present.  Michael then turns around and reveals HE IS CALEB!!
